languages.text: Местные старики долго сокрушались о былых временах. Большинство из них еще ютились у матерей под сердцем, когда снег впервые окутал привычные зеленые поля, град изничтожил весь урожай, а стужа проморозила землю. Первыми погибли растения и крупные твари, что не могли себя пропитать. За ними сгинули мелкие птицы и звери. Большинство людей погибло в крупных городах, не в силах обогреть себя и свои семьи.

traits.locale_text: Местные старики долго сокрушались о былых временах. Большинство из них еще ютились у матерей под сердцем, когда снег впервые окутала привычные зеленые поля, град изничтожил весь урожай, а стужа проморозила землю. Первыми погибли растения и крупные твари, что не могли себя пропитать. За ними сгинули мелкие птицы и звери. Большинство людей погибло в крупных городах, не в силах обогреть себя и свои семьи.

languages.text: The local elders woefully reminisced about times long gone. Most of them were still sheltered in their mothers' wombs when snow first settled on the verdant fields. Hail ruined the crops and frost hardened the soil. Plants and large beasts that could not sustain themselves were the first to go. They were soon followed by birds and other small animals. Most people in large cities perished, unable to warm themselves and their families.
languages.original_text: Местные старики долго сокрушались о былых временах. Большинство из них еще ютились у матерей под сердцем, когда снег впервые окутал привычные зеленые поля, град изничтожил весь урожай, а стужа проморозила землю. Первыми погибли растения и крупные твари, что не могли себя пропитать. За ними сгинули мелкие птицы и звери. Большинство людей погибло в крупных городах, не в силах обогреть себя и свои семьи.

traits.locale_text: The local elders woefully reminisced about the times long gone. Most of them were still sheltered in their mothers' wombs when snow first settled on the verdant fields, hail ruined the crops and frost hardened the soil. Plants and large beasts that could not sustain themselves were the first to go. They were soon followed by birds and critters. Most people in large cities perished, unable to warm themselves and their families.

Plants and large beasts that could not sustain themselves were the first to go. They were soon followed by birds and critters. Most people in large cities perished, unable to warm themselves and their families.

Most people in large cities perished, unable to warm themselves and their families.

Hail ruined the crops and frost hardened the soil. Plants and large beasts that could not sustain themselves were the first to go. They were soon followed by birds and other small animals. Most people in large cities perished, unable to warm themselves and their families.

The local elders woefully reminisced about times long gone. Most of them were still sheltered in their mothers' wombs when snow first settled on the verdant fields. Hail ruined the crops and frost hardened the soil. Plants and large beasts that could not sustain themselves were the first to go. They were soon followed by birds and other small animals. Most people in large cities perished, unable to warm themselves and their families.

languages.text: 当地的长者悲伤地回忆着逝去的时光。当雪花第一次落在翠绿的田野上时，他们中的绝大多数人还没有出生。随之而来的冰雹摧毁了庄稼，霜冻把土壤结成了冰。由于无法在严寒中生存，植物与大型动物首当其冲消失不见。没过多久，鸟类与其他小型动物也灭绝了。大城市里的大多数人因得不到供暖，也都被活活冻死。
languages.original_text: The local elders woefully reminisced about times long gone. Most of them were still sheltered in their mothers' wombs when snow first settled on the verdant fields. Hail ruined the crops and frost hardened the soil. Plants and large beasts that could not sustain themselves were the first to go. They were soon followed by birds and other small animals. Most people in large cities perished, unable to warm themselves and their families.

traits.locale_text: 当地的长者悲伤地回忆着逝去的时光。当雪花第一次落在翠绿的田野上时，他们中的绝大多数人还没有出生。随之而来的冰雹摧毁了庄稼，霜冻把土壤结成了冰。由于无法在严寒中生存，植物与大型动物首当其冲消失不见。没过多久，鸟类与其他小型动物也灭绝了。大城市里的大多数人因得不到供暖，也都被活活冻死。

languages.text: 地元の長老たちは、はるか昔に過ぎ去った時代を懐かしんでいた。青々とした野原に雪が降り積もったとき、彼らのほとんどは、まだ母親の胎内にいた。雹が作物を台無しにし、霜が土を固くした。自活できない植物や大型の獣は、真っ先に消えていった。続いて鳥や小動物が死に絶えた。大都市のほとんどの者たちは、寒さに耐えることができず、家族と共に滅びた。
languages.original_text: The local elders woefully reminisced about times long gone. Most of them were still sheltered in their mothers' wombs when snow first settled on the verdant fields. Hail ruined the crops and frost hardened the soil. Plants and large beasts that could not sustain themselves were the first to go. They were soon followed by birds and other small animals. Most people in large cities perished, unable to warm themselves and their families.

traits.locale_text: 地元の長老たちは、はるか昔に過ぎ去った時代を懐かしんでいた。青々とした野原に雪が降り積もったとき、彼らのほとんどは、まだ母親の胎内にいた。雹が作物を台無しにし、霜が土を固くした。自活できない植物や大型の獣は、真っ先に消えていった。続いて鳥や小動物が死に絶えた。大都市のほとんどの者たちは、寒さに耐えることができず、家族と共に滅びた。

languages.text: Los ancianos del lugar rememoraban con tristeza tiempos pasados. La mayoría de ellos aún estaban protegidos por el vientre de sus madres cuando la nieve se posó por primera vez en los verdes campos. El granizo arruinó las cosechas y las heladas endurecieron el suelo. Las plantas y las grandes bestias que no podían sostenerse por sí mismas fueron las primeras en desaparecer. Pronto les siguieron las aves y otros animales pequeños. La mayoría de los habitantes de las grandes ciudades perecieron, incapaces de calentarse a sí mismos y a sus familias.
languages.original_text: The local elders woefully reminisced about times long gone. Most of them were still sheltered in their mothers' wombs when snow first settled on the verdant fields. Hail ruined the crops and frost hardened the soil. Plants and large beasts that could not sustain themselves were the first to go. They were soon followed by birds and other small animals. Most people in large cities perished, unable to warm themselves and their families.

traits.locale_text: Los ancianos del lugar rememoraban con tristeza tiempos pasados. La mayoría de ellos aún estaban protegidos por el vientre de sus madres cuando la nieve se posó por primera vez en los verdes campos. El granizo arruinó las cosechas y las heladas endurecieron el suelo. Las plantas y las grandes bestias que no podían sostenerse por sí mismas fueron las primeras en desaparecer. Pronto les siguieron las aves y otros animales pequeños. La mayoría de los habitantes de las grandes ciudades perecieron, incapaces de calentarse a sí mismos y a sus familias.

languages.text: Die Ältesten der Kolonie erinnerten sich voller Wehmut an alte Zeiten zurück. Die meisten waren noch behütet im Schoß ihrer Mütter gelegen, als sich das erste Mal Schnee auf die grünen Felder legte. Hagel zerstörte die Ernte, Frost härtete die Erde. Pflanzen und große Tiere, die sich nicht mehr ernähren konnten, verschwanden als Erstes. Bald darauf gefolgt von den Vögeln und anderen kleinen Tieren. Die meisten Menschen in großen Städten starben, weil sie sich und ihre Familien nicht wärmen konnten.
languages.original_text: The local elders woefully reminisced about times long gone. Most of them were still sheltered in their mothers' wombs when snow first settled on the verdant fields. Hail ruined the crops and frost hardened the soil. Plants and large beasts that could not sustain themselves were the first to go. They were soon followed by birds and other small animals. Most people in large cities perished, unable to warm themselves and their families.

traits.locale_text: Die Ältesten der Kolonie erinnerten sich voller Wehmut an alte Zeiten zurück. Die meisten waren noch behütet im Schoß ihrer Mütter gelegen, als sich das erste Mal Schnee auf die grünen Felder legte. Hagel zerstörte die Ernte, Frost härtete die Erde. Pflanzen und große Tiere, die sich nicht mehr ernähren konnten, verschwanden als Erstes. Bald darauf gefolgt von den Vögeln und anderen kleinen Tieren. Die meisten Menschen in großen Städten starben, weil sie sich und ihre Familien nicht wärmen konnten.

languages.text: Les aînés de la colonie évoquent avec nostalgie des temps révolus depuis belle lurette. La plupart d'entre eux étaient encore dans le ventre de leurs mères quand la neige a commencé à tomber sur les prairies verdoyantes. Puis, la grêle a dévasté les récoltes et le gel a durci les sols. Privés de nourriture, les plantes et les animaux de grande taille ont péri les premiers, suivis de près par les oiseaux et les autres espèces de plus petite taille. La plupart des habitants des grandes villes sont morts de froid.
languages.original_text: The local elders woefully reminisced about times long gone. Most of them were still sheltered in their mothers' wombs when snow first settled on the verdant fields. Hail ruined the crops and frost hardened the soil. Plants and large beasts that could not sustain themselves were the first to go. They were soon followed by birds and other small animals. Most people in large cities perished, unable to warm themselves and their families.

La plupart d'entre eux étaient encore dans le ventre de leurs mères quand la neige a commencé à tomber sur les prairies verdoyantes. Puis, la grêle a dévasté les récoltes et le gel a durci les sols.
